page.title: 14Local Schools
page.content: On Wednesday 10th of July we went on a survey around Sevenoaks district. We had to note down all the different schools and churches we saw. We went with Mrs. Spencer in her car. As we went along we told jokes to each other. We started in Sevenoaks, then we went on to Godden Green, Seal and Underriver. The schools we saw were Sevenoaks School, a secondary school for girls and boys, in Sevenoaks High Street; St. Johns Primary School, St. Johns Hill, primary school for girls and boys; Wilderness, Seal Hollow Road, secondary school for boys; Dorton House, Seal Hollow Road, a school for the blind; Walthamstow Hall, Holly Bush Lane, school for girls age 5 to 18. We arrived back at school at 15.10.
